name: admin-login.toml
rawContent:
# Admin Login Route
# Simple auth for admin panel

[route]
id = "admin-login"
path = "/prototype/admin/login"
title = "Admin Login"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "guest"

[page.description]
summary = "Admin panel authentication"
features = [
  "Quick login button",
  "Demo user selection"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]
platforms = ["admin-app"]
useCases = ["authenticate-phone"]
components = ["phone-auth-form"]
events = ["auth-otp-sent", "auth-verified"]

[implementation]
component = "LoginScreen"
file = "src/prototype/pages/admin/LoginScreen.tsx"
status = "implemented"
